text: "Watch the Wind Blow By" is a 2003 song by Tim McGraw and was written by Anders Osborne. It is the fifth and final single from his seventh studio album Tim McGraw and the Dancehall Doctors. It went to number 32 in the United States and topped the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. ==References== Category:2003 songs Category:Country songs Category:Tim McGraw songs
title: Watch the Wind Blow By
